sentences.chinese: 电池可以为12V的32根线束供电。

sentences.english: While this is particularly true for primary cells, this technique can also be used for secondary cells.
sentences.chinese: 尽管对于原电池是这样，该技术还可以用于蓄电池。

sentences.english: While this is particularly true for primary cells, this technique can also be used for secondary cells.
sentences.chinese: 尽管对于原电池是这样，该技术还可以用于蓄电池。

sentences.english: Yes, I sell high rate discharge lifepo4 batteries.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我卖的高倍率磷酸铁锂电池。

sentences.english: It was almost impossible to get a car mended in Lundazi, or even to replace a battery.
sentences.chinese: 在伦达孜你休想修车，连换电池都办不到。

sentences.english: In this case, Discharging termination voltage means 1.0voltage per cell.
sentences.chinese: 中止放电电压规定为每节电池1V。

sentences.english: Right now, Hockaday's prototypes put out only a few milli- watts of power.
sentences.chinese: 现在，霍克蒂的燃料电池原型只能输出几毫瓦的电力。

sentences.english: That process can repeat over and over, so the cells rarely need replacing.
sentences.chinese: 这个过程可以不断的重复，所以电池几乎不需要更换。

sentences.english: In the simplest chemicing cell the electrolyte is the most efficient of sulfuric air conditioning unitidity in wdinedr.
sentences.chinese: 在最容易的化学电池内，电解液是硫酸的水溶液。

sentences.english: The zinc nail and the copper penny are called electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 镀锌钉和铜硬币就是电池的电极。

sentences.english: Adamaged or leaking battery should not be transported.
sentences.chinese: 已损坏或泄漏的电池不能予以运输。

sentences.english: The promise of fuel cells for efficient, eco-friendly power generation has become a reality.
sentences.chinese: 承诺燃料电池的效率高，环保型发电已成为现实。

sentences.english: It will also improve battery life and power consumption.
sentences.chinese: 同时还能提高电池效率，增加电源续航力。

sentences.english: Connected a piece of thin wire to a dry cell.
sentences.chinese: 在一节干电池上接上一段细铁丝。

sentences.english: Think of a battery as a bottle for energy, and the power density as the size of the bottle’s neck.
sentences.chinese: 想象电池是一个能量瓶，电能密度就是瓶颈的尺寸。

sentences.english: People back in the 1950s to make the first PV.
sentences.chinese: 人们早在本世纪50年代就制成了第一个光电池。
